solution_line_template: Since there are {pack_size} cards in a pack and {weeks_per_year} weeks in a year, Phil starts by collecting {pack_size}*{weeks_per_year}= <<{pack_size}*{weeks_per_year}={initial_cards}>>{initial_cards} baseball cards
He then loses half of them for {initial_cards}/{loss_divisor}= <<{initial_cards}/{loss_divisor}={remaining_cards}>>{remaining_cards} cards remaining.
